about.description:
Dagster lets you define pipelines in terms of the data flow between reusable, logical components,
then test locally and run anywhere. With a unified view of pipelines and the assets they produce,
Dagster can schedule and orchestrate Pandas, Spark, SQL, or anything else that Python can invoke.

Dagster is designed for data platform engineers, data engineers, and full-stack data scientists.
Building a data platform with Dagster makes your stakeholders more independent and your systems
more robust. Developing data pipelines with Dagster makes testing easier and deploying faster.
about.summary: The data orchestration platform built for productivity.

name: dagster

  entry_points:
    - dagster = dagster.cli:main
    - dagster-daemon = dagster.daemon.cli:main
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: cd dagster && /home/conda/feedstock_root/build_artifacts/dagster-meta_1666973006436/_h_env_placehold_placehold_placehold_placehold_placehold_placehold_placehold_placehold_placehold_placehold_placehold_placehold_placehold_placehold_placehold_placehold_placehold_placehol/bin/python
    -m pip install . -vv --no-deps
  string: pyhd8ed1ab_0
  version: 1.0.15

    - tzdata 2022e h191b570_0

    - xz 5.2.6 h166bdaf_0
  run:
    - alembic >=1.2.1,!=1.6.3,!=1.7.0
    - click >=5.0
    - coloredlogs >=6.1,<=14.0
    - croniter >=0.3.34
    - docstring_parser
    - grpcio >=1.32.0,<1.48.1
    - grpcio-health-checking >=1.32.0,<1.44.0

    - sqlalchemy >=1.0
    - tabulate
    - toposort >=1.0
    - tqdm
    - typing-compat
    - typing_extensions >=4.0.1
    - watchdog >=0.8.3
  run_constrained:

test:

    - pip check
    - dagster --help
    - dagster-daemon --help
  imports:

    - dagster.api
    - dagster.check
    - dagster.cli
    - dagster.config
    - dagster.core.definitions
    - dagster.core.events
    - dagster.core.execution
    - dagster.core.executor

    - dagster.loggers

    - dagster.utils

    - pip
about:
  description: 'Dagster lets you define pipelines in terms of the data flow between
    reusable, logical components,

    then test locally and run anywhere. With a unified view of pipelines and the assets
    they produce,

    Dagster can schedule and orchestrate Pandas, Spark, SQL, or anything else that
    Python can invoke.


    Dagster is designed for data platform engineers, data engineers, and full-stack
    data scientists.

    Building a data platform with Dagster makes your stakeholders more independent
    and your systems

    more robust. Developing data pipelines with Dagster makes testing easier and deploying
    faster.

    '
  doc_url: https://dagster.readthedocs.io
  home: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_family: APACHE
  license_file: dagster/LICENSE
  summary: The data orchestration platform built for productivity.
extra:

  feedstock-name: dagster
  final: true
  recipe-maintainers:

    - mgasner
    - xhochy

about.description:
Dagster lets you define pipelines in terms of the data flow between reusable, logical components,
then test locally and run anywhere. With a unified view of pipelines and the assets they produce,
Dagster can schedule and orchestrate Pandas, Spark, SQL, or anything else that Python can invoke.

Dagster is designed for data platform engineers, data engineers, and full-stack data scientists.
Building a data platform with Dagster makes your stakeholders more independent and your systems
more robust. Developing data pipelines with Dagster makes testing easier and deploying faster.
about.summary: The data orchestration platform built for productivity.
